properties.Name: Cincinnati
properties.Description: I was born in Cincinnati and grew up in northern Kentucky. I grew up in a very chaotic house with three brothers.

properties.Name: NE Ohio
properties.Description: My mom took at position at Smuckers and moved to our family to Akron when I was eleven.

properties.Name: Cuyahoga Valley National Park - Community Engagement Intern
properties.Description: Offered engaging cultural and natural interpretations of the area to park visitors

properties.Name: Queens University of Charlotte - GIS Assistant
properties.Description: Played college lacrosse while earning a degree in biology. I had my introduction to GIS here. My formal GIS education is from Queens. Collaborated with a nonprofit organization to create web maps displaying top polluters within the Catabawa River Basin

properties.Name: Ohio State University
properties.Description: I finished my undergraduate degree at the Ohio State University.

properties.Name: Kupu - HYCC Team Leader
properties.Description: Supervised a team of four interns while completing enviromnetal restoration projects.

properties.Name: Ohio State University Department of EEOB - Teaching Assistant
properties.Description: Managed a lab setting of 25 students by preparing and effectively communicating material.

properties.Name: Ohio State University - Undergraduate Research Assistant
properties.Description: Standardized raw, qualitave data pertaining to the Biology curricula at Ohio State University. This data was used To score professors on their ability to teach the outlined curriculum

properties.Name: Hampton Resources - GIS Analyst
properties.Description: Analyzed geospatial data, created maps, maintained GIS databases, performed spatial analysis, supported decision-making, and collaborated with Foresters to solve help reduce spatial challenges. This was for about 365,000 acres.

properties.Name: URISA Emerging Professionals Program - Board Member
properties.Description: Organize meetings/agendas, select metors/mentees, Create educational materials and resources for mentorship pair.
